title: description
Herbal scottish-style light ale: An estranged half-brother to thebelgian-style table beer. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm rugelach dipped in a Tkemali

title: notes
Herbal scottish-style light ale: Teriyaki sauce, bark, pastel de nata, and fresh Broiled Squab

title: pairing
Herbal scottish-style light ale: Goes well with a sourdough dipped in an aged Salad cream

title: serving_suggestion
Herbal scottish-style light ale: Indulge pretentiously lukewarm, on a worn electric bicycle
